message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

Thanks for the offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell it to you for $135. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit higher than that. How about $125?

I understand you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further. I can sell the product to you for $130. It's the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great value for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit higher than $130. How about $125 again?

Bob, I understand you're really close to making a decision. I'm willing to make one final compromise. I can sell the product to you for $129. It's the lowest I can go, and I think it's a great deal for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not willing to go above $125. I'm willing to buy the product from you for $125.
